theVacant:LashOut.NAME: Lash Out
theVacant:LashOut.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your missing HP. NL Exhaust.

theVacant:Vengeance.DESCRIPTION: thevacant:Unnate. NL Deal !D! damage for each time you lost HP this combat.

theVacant:Frenzy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each card in your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

theVacant:Snowball.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When this card is thevacant:Milled, double its damage this combat.

theVacant:EyePoke.NAME: Eye Poke

theVacant:FranticBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you are thevacant:Wounded, deal !D! damage again.

theVacant:Throttle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Frail.

theVacant:BrassMagnet.DESCRIPTION: thevacant:Rebound. NL Deal !D! damage. Whenever you draw this card, discard it.

theVacant:FiendFrost.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each card in your Exhaust pile. NL Exhaust.

theVacant:Yeet.NAME: Yeet
theVacant:Yeet.DESCRIPTION: thevacant:Rebound. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you thevacant:Mill this card, deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

theVacant:DimensionTear.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add your Exhaust pile to your hand. Exhaust your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

theVacant:BurdenBreak.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you thevacant:Mill, thevacant:Mill an additional !M!.

theVacant:FinalCountdown.NAME: Final Countdown
theVacant:FinalCountdown.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 [E] less for each time you thevacant:Released this combat. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

theVacant:SkullBash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

theVacant:EmptyShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to your missing HP.

theVacant:Cower.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If you are thevacant:Wounded, gain !B! Block again.

theVacant:Return.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put !M! cards from your discard pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.

theVacant:Fortify.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you are thevacant:Wounded, gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

theVacant:BattleScars.DESCRIPTION: If you are thevacant:Wounded, gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

theVacant:Unearth.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards from the bottom of your draw pile.

theVacant:Expand.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Max HP. NL Lose 6 HP. NL Exhaust.

theVacant:Enrage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Vigor. If you are thevacant:Wounded, gain an additional !M!.

theVacant:WhenDarknessComes.DESCRIPTION: Apply 2 thevacant:Doom to EVERYONE. NL Each thevacant:Doom increases damage taken on enemies by !M! more.
